initial.subject: Invoice for Services Rendered
initial.body:
Dear Client,

Please find attached the invoice for services rendered in February. The total amount due is $5,250. Payment is due within 30 days of receipt. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Thank you for your business.

Sincerely,
PaymentHub Billing Team

reminder.subject: Reminder: Invoice #20240220 Due
reminder.body:
Hello,

This is a friendly reminder that invoice #20240220 is due tomorrow. Please ensure payment is processed to avoid any late fees. Let us know if you need another copy of the invoice.

Best regards,
PaymentHub
